title: Technical Support Specialist
full_description: Stoel Rives has an immediate opening for a Technical Support Specialist, based in our Seattle office. This role provides professional, reliable, and responsive information, training, troubleshooting, and other support related to the setup and use of the firm's information technology. Technical Support Specialists are experts on all the core applications and hardware in use at the firm. This position responds to escalated technical support incidents and requests for technology setups via email, telephone, and in-person during core business hours and after-hours when necessary. This position also requires excellent communication skills and the ability to convey information and provide technical support and training both in-person and remotely.Technical Support Specialists also deploy and track end-user hardware inventory and participate in the successful completion of all IT projects.JOB FUNCTIONS AND RESPONSIBILITIESRespond and provide timely resolution to requests
